short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switches tabs based on a timer specified for each tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically switches tabs based on a timer specified for each tab.
When you press start the extension is active in that window and you can input the time for each tab.
